sentences.sContent: The viper paralyses its prey by injecting it with venom.
sentences.sCn: 蝰蛇通过注入毒液使猎物麻痹。

words.tran: 有毒的；恶毒的；分泌毒液的；怨恨的
充满恶意地；狠毒地，恶毒地

trans.tranCn: 毒液 and transmitted to prey or an enemy chiefly by biting or stinging)； 毒物(poisonous matter)； 恶意(ill will； malevolence)
trans.tranOther: a liquid poison that some snakes, insects etc produce when they bite or sting you
